AI Description: Quantum ESPRESSO is an integrated suite of open-source computer codes for electronic-structure calculations and materials modeling at the nanoscale. It is based on density-functional theory, plane waves, and pseudopotentials. The software package aims to provide a range of tools for quantum mechanical modeling of materials and nanostructures.
Core Features: Electronic-Structure Calculations, Density-Functional Theory, Plane-Wave Basis Sets, Pseudopotentials, Materials Modeling, Nanoscale Simulations
General Tags: Electronic-Structure Calculations, Materials Modeling, Nanoscale Simulations, Quantum Mechanics
